Answers: An extra course is like a bonus class where you learn more about a specific topic outside your regular studies.

Questions: What is the purpose of the add-on course module in our ERP system?
Answers: The add-on course module is designed to enhance your skills and knowledge within our ERP system. It offers specialised training on specific functionalities to help you maximise the benefits of the software.

Questions: Can I access course materials on various devices?
Answers: Yes, you can access your course materials on various devices such as laptops, tablets, and smartphones. Ensure that you have a compatible internet browser for optimal experience.

Questions: How do I access course materials for the add-on course
Answers: Course materials are typically accessible through a dedicated online platform. Upon enrollment, you'll receive instructions on how to access lectures, readings, assignments, and any additional resources related to the add-on course.

Questions: How long do extra courses last?
Answers: It varies. Some finish in a few weeks, and others take a few months. Look at the course details to find out how long it will take.

Questions: Do I need to know something before starting an extra course?
Answers: Depends on the course. Some need basic knowledge, while others are open to beginners. Check the course info to see if there are any requirements.

Questions: How do I get a certificate after finishing an extra course?
Answers: When you finish the course, you usually get a certificate. Management will tell you how to get itâ€”whether it's a digital one or a paper copy.

Questions: Can I do more than one extra course at a time?
Answers: Yes, It's on you and the courses. Some people do multiple courses, but it's essential to manage your time well so you don't feel overwhelmed.

Questions: How do I enroll in an add-on course?
Answers: To enroll in an add-on course, navigate to the add-on course page and look for the registration section.

Questions: What if I miss a class or fall behind in an extra course?
Answers: Many courses are recorded, so you can catch up later. If you need extra help, you can reach out to the course community or the instructor.
